please_select_timezone: Please select a Time Zone for The System to Use
manual_partitioning_page_subtitle:
Use This Page to Create a Custom Filesystem Table for PikaOS to install into.
Instructions:
 - Use The Partitioning Utility to Create New Partitions or Reformat and Reuse Existing Ones. 
 - The Mandatory System Partitons are:
	* 512MB+ Fat32/vfat Partition for /boot/efi (An Existing EFI Partition Can be Left Unformated and Used for /boot/efi in Order to Achieve Dual-Boot).
	* 1000MB+ EXT4 Partition for /boot (Can NOT Be Shared... Format MANDATORY!).
	* 26GB+ EXT4/BTRFS/XFS/F2FS Partition for / (a.k.a Root) (Can NOT Be Shared... Format MANDATORY!).
 - This Installer Doesn't Erase Any Data Automatically, Format Your Drives MANUALLY Via The Partitioning Utility.
 - To Add a linux-swap Partition Set Mountpoint to [SWAP]
 - To Add LUKS Encrypted Partitions or Any Kind of Partition That Uses Mapper
	Use The Partitioning Utility to Map/Unlock Them, Then Their Mapping Will be Shown as Partition Selections.

please_read_eula: Please carefully read and make sure you consent to the following before installing PikaOS:
eula_buffer_text:
There are a few things to keep in mind: 
        1 - PikaOS is not affiliated with Debian. Debian is a registered trademark owned by Software in the Public Interest, Inc. 
        2 - This is a hobby distribution, so we will try our best to provide formal support but it will -NOT- be guaranteed. 
        3 - Although PikaOS might provide identical patches or user experience to the Nobara project, we are -NOT- directly a part of them so questions and bug reports should not be sent directly to them (they dont have to deal with it!) 
        4 - While the installer is running DO NOT INTERRUPT IT! or you will end up with a corrupted system. 
        5 - Try to use pikman instead of apt when using the terminal, it is much faster! 
        6 - You understand the xone driver downloads needed binaries locally and does not directly package or distribute any copyrighted firmware or other related data. 
        7 - Automatic partitioning will format all partitons on a drive, so if you want to dualboot make a separate EFI partition for PikaOS and use manual partitioning  
        8 - In case you need the login info for this session: 
         - username: pikaos 
         - password: 
        MEANING: JUST PRESS ENTER
eula_accept_checkbutton_label: I Agree and Accept the User license Agreement
efi_error_text_label: PikaOS Only works on GPT UEFI Systems, This Machine is Booted in CSM/LEGACY mode.
